detail_desc: High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a belt, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Opaque tights with a sheen and an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Push-up lace bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
5-pocket trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in creases front and back that flare from the knee down.
Long wide dress in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke front and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.

Two-button jacket in sturdy stretch jersey with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket.  Lined sleeves. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline and short puff sleeves with a narrow trim.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Sports popover jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip at the top. Mesh-lined back with a loose, ventilating yoke, and ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the neckline and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Joggers in a soft cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring waist, patch front pockets, a fake fly, back pockets and elasticated hems.

Straight-cut jacket in stretch imitation suede with raw edges, notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Seams at the back and on the sleeves, and pockets in the side seams with decorative flaps. Unlined.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Printed swim shorts with an elasticated waist with ties. Mesh inner shorts.

Trousers in cotton twill with elastication at the back of the waist, a drawstring at the front and button fly. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud and shaping seams at the knees.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with embroidery on the front and legs. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist.

Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high, frill-trimmed, smocked waist and twisted drawstring with tassels. Buttons made of shell half way down the front and an asymmetric hem finishing in a gathered flounce. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a jacquard weave with a boat neck, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and pleats at the top of the skirt for extra width. Unlined.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and a zip at the top. Unlined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fine-knit, shaftless socks.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, ribbed V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Maxi dress in airy, tiered chiffon with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Hooded jacket in a soft cotton blend with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut coat in a soft weave with notch lapels, a one-button fastening, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft cotton. Top in patterned jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in a crinkled weave with flounces at the front, elastication at the back of the shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-3Y) and elasticated hems.
Calf-length, A-line dress in an airy weave. V-neck with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulder straps, and covered elastication at the top of the back. Unlined.

Jacket in a patterned viscose and linen weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Slits in the sides. Lined.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide lace trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with inset hole-patterned trims. Small, scallop-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top and long balloon sleeves with gathered, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips and a wide skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Large bag in imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 14x30x38 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs decorated with rhinestones and pearly plastic beads.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
Straw hat with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Small metal hoop earrings with pendants in various designs. Length approx. 2.8 cm.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Straight-style cardigan in a soft knit. Dropped shoulders with decorative studs, long sleeves, patch front pockets and wide ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Loose-fit trousers in stretch twill with a detachable tie belt, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Cropped vest top in organic cotton jersey with a print motif.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly organic.

Knee-length dress in an airy, textured weave made from a viscose blend with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist.

Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool. High, ribbed collar, low dropped shoulders with decorative sparkly buttons on one side, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Jacket in faux fur with a collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves with ribbing along the top, and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part pocket at the top and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems with crocheted trims.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.

Short dress in airy, softly draping chiffon with a V-neck and seam under the bust. Long, wide puff sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam above the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Flared, airy skirt. Jersey lining.
A pair of large glasses in glittery plastic with Christmas trees on top decorated with colourful sparkly studs. No lenses.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide blouse in soft leather with a grandad collar, V-shaped opening at the front and a covered button at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
